about_the_game:
A gripping detective series filled with mystery and riddles awaits you! The sea harbors many mysteries not meant for human eyes. At the call of the people of a seaside town, we investigate an ancient ship that does not show up on any radar, only to have the captain's ghost possess the local lighthouse keeper. To save the ignorant townsfolk from the impending doom of becoming fuel for the ship, we must find the lone surviving ancestor of the sea creatures that once dwelt on this island. Get a chance to break the curse before the evil captain finds them first! Challenge your investigator skills in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🧩 Your own choices!
Leading this mysterious investigation of the adventure you will have the opportunity to choose the character's phrases for a particular action and influence the plot. Don’t forget that your choice defines not only the course of your journey, but the life of charming sirens!

🧩 A variety of achievements!
Conduct your own investigation solving intricate puzzles, challenging riddles and playing various mini-games. Explore multiple picturesque locations for hidden objects, search and find mysteries and secrets to earn achievements and highlight your success as a real detective!

🧩 Save the coastal town!
This coastal town is a perfect target for his plans and only you can find a way to stop him! Seek and find ship-themed hidden objects while searching atmospheric locations and challenge your investigator skills solving tricky brain teasers!

🧩 Collectible items!
Detective adventure is full of collector’s items and objects that the player needs to find in order to advance in the investigation! Search the siren’s island for hidden treasures and solve mystical brain teasers to collect peculiar objects!
